content.raw:
For the SDFormat compatibility with VS2015, I think it would be sufficient to backport this two PRs :

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/296/fix-for-compiling-with-visual-studio-and/diff
* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/345/fix-os-specific-initialization-in/diff

However as we discuss about this, I think that Gazebo is currently not compiling with SDFormat 6, see #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2731 . 

Notice that while I am able to compile with VS2015, I was never able to get `gzclient` to run properly.
content.html:
For the SDFormat compatibility with VS2015, I think it would be sufficient to backport this two PRs :

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/296/fix-for-compiling-with-visual-studio-and/diff
  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/345/fix-os-specific-initialization-in/diff

However as we discuss about this, I think that Gazebo is currently not compiling with SDFormat 6, see #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2731 .

Notice that while I am able to compile with VS2015, I was never able to get gzclient to run properly.
